pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, January 31, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec 

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit Vêtements Peerless Inc., and meet with employees to discuss the benefits of the new NAFTA for workers and the economy. A short media availability will follow.

8888, boulevard Pie-IX                  

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:15 a.m.

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with business and community leaders.

Maison d’Haïti
3245, avenue Émile-Journault

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:00 a.m.

The Prime Minister will visit La Maison Bleue de Saint-Michel.

Closed to media.
